Long comment is long comment. \_(ツ)_/

(Opinion) Vanilla has less to do with reality and more to do with cleaner morals and overall common sense. For example, you can't exactly factor prostitution into a vanilla story, mainly because the woman in question is more or less of a slut, which honestly doesn't compliment a 'vanilla' setting. The only exception would be if said prostitute 'fell in love' and stopped prostituting themselves.
Vanilla in general would simply just be two people (or more, depends) in some sort of significant relationship having sex. But the 'sex' part of it is relatively more flexible than people would think. Ranging from normal, unadulterated sex, to ass smacking, deepthroat, bondage to intense kinky fetishes like BDSM and shit like choking. But 'vanilla' generally depends on what you yourself think would be normal. Cause you can't tell me that rape is 'normal.' The dictionary definition of "Vanilla" generally would be enough to explain what it is, but it's been twisted to the people's own desires.

Now we need a part 2 where the elf-girl is getting her world absolutely rocked by an orc, with the dude from this one walking in on it and getting his heart broken in the process as he finds out that the elf-girl not only doesn't give a shit about him, but that he's awful at sex and she was faking it the entire time with him.

Turn this into a proper NTR. :D
